sentences.sentence: She was abducted by a dangerous psychopath.
sentences.translation: 她被一名危险的精神变态者劫持了。

sentences.sentence: The teenager may have been abducted by a religious cult.
sentences.translation: 这位少年可能被某个异教团体绑架了。

sentences.sentence: He was on his way to the airport when his car was held up and he was abducted by four gunmen.
sentences.translation: 在去机场的路上，他的车遭到拦截，他被４名持枪歹徒绑架了。
